MVDatasetÔÉÅ

class mvdatasets.mvdataset.MVDataset(dataset_name: str, scene_name: str, datasets_path: Path, splits: list, point_clouds_paths: list = [], config: dict = {}, pose_only: bool = False, verbose: bool = False)ÔÉÅ

Any dataset container. All data is stored in CPU memory.
